AI Description: The rtracklayer package provides a collection of tools to process and manipulate genome annotation tracks in R. It enables users to read, write, and manipulate popular genome annotation file formats such as BED, GFF, BEDGraph, and BAM. rtracklayer facilitates the visualization, summarization, and analysis of genomic data, making it easier for researchers to work with biological data in R environments.
Core Features: Reading and writing genome annotation files
Manipulation and visualization of genomic data tracks
Integration with popular bioinformatics tools and databases
Flexible and customizable functionalities for data analysis
